Tired of the same old browsing routine? Ready to inject a dose of spine-tingling excitement into your online adventures? ðŸ‘€ What's the Whispering Shadows, you ask? It's like a friendly ghost for your browser, here to make your online experience a tad spookier, just in time for Halloween.

Install the extension and browser to experience many types of paranormal activity. It might happen right away, or it might take a while to catch you out-of-guard. You can even configure what is the best time for the paranormal activities to begin!

Don't forget to keep your sound on! Better if experienced with HeadPhones!
